verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: says] [ARG1: Melania Trump wo n't join her husband when he heads to the Camp David presidential retreat for the weekend , marking 22 straight days without a public appearance after a recent surgery] .

The White House says Melania Trump [V: wo] n't join her husband when he heads to the Camp David presidential retreat for the weekend , marking 22 straight days without a public appearance after a recent surgery .

The White House says Melania Trump wo n't join her husband [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: heads] [ARG1: to the Camp David presidential retreat] [ARGM-TMP: for the weekend] , marking 22 straight days without a public appearance after a recent surgery .
